## QueryPermanentStorageGridInitializerComponent class

Component used for rendering query, permanent storage grid initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryPermanentStorageGridInitializerComponent extends QueryGridInitializerComponent implements QueryPermanentStorageGridInitializer, GridPluginGeneric<QueryPermanentStorageGridInitializerOptions> 
```
